mapper.sql: spu_classification_id AS "spuClassificationId", spu_id AS "spuId", name AS "name", shelf_life AS "shelfLife", inventory AS "inventory", production_time AS "productionTime", important AS "important", weight AS "weight", material_id AS "materialId", cost AS "cost", vulnerability AS "vulnerability", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId", class_id AS "classId", unit_id AS "unitId", category_id AS "categoryId", attribute AS "attribute", curing_cycle AS "curingCycle", cycle_type AS "cycleType", model AS "model",production_type AS "productionType"
mapper.select:
select
from goods_spu where 1 = 1
and name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')
and shelf_life like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.shelfLife},'%')
and inventory like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inventory},'%')
and production_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.productionTime},'%')
and important like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.important},'%')
and weight like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.weight},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and cost like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.cost},'%')
and vulnerability like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.vulnerability},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and class_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.classId},'%')
and unit_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.unitId},'%')
and category_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.categoryId},'%')
and attribute like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.attribute},'%')
